info.title: ThingSpace Software Management Services API (v2)
info.description: The ThingSpace Software Management Services API lets customers manage, schedule, and distribute software updates to eligible 4G and 5G Internet of Things (IoT) devices already deployed in the field. This allows devices-even those in inaccessible locations-to be upgraded easily, reducing the need for site visits and truck rolls.

tags.name: Campaigns V2
tags.description: Schedule, retrieve or cancel scheduled FOTA campaigns.

tags.name: Software Management Callbacks V2
tags.description: Find registered callbacks or create, update and delete a registered callback.

tags.name: Software Management Reports V2
tags.description: Status of a campaign per device.

tags.name: Client Logging
tags.description: Device logs stored on the device itself.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a FOTA subscription by account.
The endpoint allows user to list license usage.

post.description: This endpoint allows user to assign licenses to a list of devices.
This endpoint allows user to remove licenses from a list of devices.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of license cancellation candidate devices
get.description: The license cancel endpoint allows user to list registered license cancellation candidate devices.

200.description: A list of license cancellation candidate devices.

post.summary: Create a list of license cancellation candidate devices
post.description: The license cancel endpoint allows user to create a list of license cancellation candidate devices.

200.description: Return a created license cancellation device list.

delete.summary: Delete a previously created cancel candidate device list
delete.description: This endpoint allows user to delete a created cancel candidate device list.

200.description: Result of deletion of candidate list of devices to remove.

post.description: This endpoint allows user to schedule a software upgrade.

get.summary: Get information of a software upgrade.
get.description: This endpoint allows user to get information of a software upgrade.

put.summary: Add or Remove device to existing software upgrade
put.description: This endpoint allows user to Add or Remove devices to an existing software upgrade.

requestBody.description: Request to add or remove device to existing software upgrade information.

200.description: Result of adding or removing devices to existing software upgrade information.

delete.summary: Cancel a previously scheduled software upgrade
delete.description: This endpoint allows user to cancel software upgrade. A software upgrade already started can not be cancelled.

put.summary: Change campaign dates and time windows
put.description: This endpoint allows user to change campaign dates and time windows. Fields which need to remain unchanged should be also provided.

get.description: This endpoint allows user to get the registered callback information.

put.description: This endpoint allows user to update the HTTPS callback address.

post.description: This endpoint allows user to create the HTTPS callback address.

delete.description: This endpoint allows user to delete a previously registered callback URL.

get.summary: Get a list of available software
get.description: This endpoint allows user to list a certain type of software of an account.

parameters.name: distributionType
parameters.description: Filter distributionType to get specific type of software. Value is LWM2M, OMD-DM or HTTP.

get.description: The device endpoint gets devices information of an account.

parameters.name: distributionType
parameters.description: Filter distributionType to get specific type of devices. Values is LWM2M, OMD-DM or HTTP.

get.description: The endpoint allows user to get software upgrade history of a device based on device IMEI.

schema.description: Array of software upgrade objects with the specified status.

get.summary: Get campaign history for specified status.
get.description: The report endpoint allows user to get campaign history of an account for specified status.
The report endpoint allows user to get the full list of device of a campaign.
Returns an array of all devices in the specified account for which logging is enabled.

200.description: List containing device logging status information.

put.summary: Turn logging on for the list of devices
put.description: Each customer may have a maximum of 20 devices enabled for logging.

200.description: List containing device logging status information.

delete.description: Turn logging off for a list of devices.

put.summary: Turn logging on for the device specified
put.description: Enables logging for a specific device.

delete.summary: Turn logging off for the device specified
delete.description: Disables logging for a specific device.

get.summary: Get logs for the device specified
get.description: Gets logs for a specific device.

get.summary: Get check-in history for the device specified
get.description: Check-in history can be retrieved for any device belonging to the account, not necessarily with logging enabled.

get.summary: Retrieves a list of available files.
get.description: You can retrieve a list of configuration or supplementary of files for an account.

parameters.name: distributionType
parameters.description: Filter the distributionType to only retrieve files for a specific distribution type.

post.summary: Uploads a configuration supplementary file for an account.
post.description: Uploads a configuration/supplementary file for an account. ThingSpace generates a fileName after the upload and is returned in the response.

localTargetPath.description: Local target path on the device.

post.description: You can upload configuration files and schedule them in a campaign to devices.

post.summary: Schedules a software upgrade for HTTP devices.
post.description: Campaign time windows for downloading and installing software are available as long as the device OEM supports this.

purchaseType.description: Subscription models used by the account.

licenseCount.description: Number of monthly licenses in an MRC subscription.

licenseUsedCount.description: Number of licenses currently assigned to devices.

updateTime.description: The date and time of when the subscription was last updated.

hasMoreData.description: True if there are more devices to retrieve.

deviceList.description: List of devices with id in IMEI.

V2LicenseIMEI.description: IMEIs of the devices to assign or remove licenses.

V2ListOfLicensesToRemoveResult.description: List of created license cancellation devices.

V2ListOfLicensesToRemove.description: A list of license cancellation candidate devices.

downloadAfterDate.description: Specifies starting date client should download package. If null, client will download as soon as possible.

downloadTimeWindowList.description: List of allowed download time windows.

installAfterDate.description: Client will install package after date. If null, client will install as soon as possible.

installTimeWindowList.description: List of allowed install time windows.

downloadAfterDate.description: Specifies starting date client should download package. If null, client will download as soon as possible.

downloadTimeWindowList.description: List of allowed download time windows.

installAfterDate.description: Client will install package after date. If null, client will install as soon as possible.

installTimeWindowList.description: List of allowed install time windows.

downloadAfterDate.description: Specifies starting date client should download package. If null, client will download as soon as possible.

downloadTimeWindowList.description: List of allowed download time windows. Removing of existing windows is not allowed.

installAfterDate.description: Client will install package after date. If null, client will install as soon as possible.

installTimeWindowList.description: List of allowed install time windows. Removing of existing windows is not allowed.

V2AddOrRemoveDeviceRequest.description: Add or remove device to existing software upgrade information.

V2AddOrRemoveDeviceResult.description: Add or remove devices from the existing software upgrade information.

url.description: Callback URL for an subscribed service.
Callback URL for an subscribed service.

releaseNote.description: Software release note reserved for future use.

devicePlatformId.description: The platform (Android, iOS, etc.) that the software can be applied to.

DeviceSoftwareUpgrade.description: Array of software upgrade objects with the specified status.

V2CampaignDevice.description: List of devices in a campaign.

createTime.description: The date and time of when the device is created.

upgradeTime.description: The date and time of when the device firmware or software is upgraded.

updateTime.description: The date and time of when the device is updated.

refreshTime.description: The date and time of when the device is refreshed.

startTime.description: Start hour in range [0..23], current hour >= startTime.

endTime.description: End hour in range [1..24], current hour < endTime.

V2TimeWindow.description: Allowed start and end time windows.

logType.description: Log type (one of SoftwareUpdate, Event, UserNotification, AgentService, Wireless, WirelessWeb, MobileBroadbandModem, WindowsMDM).

binaryLogFileBase64.description: Base64-encoded contents of binary log file.

binaryLogFilename.description: File name of binary log file.

expiryDate.description: The date when device logging expires.

fileName.description: The name of the file you are upgrading to.

fileVersion.description: The version of the file you are upgrading to.

devicePlatformId.description: The platform (Android, iOS, etc.) that the software can be applied to.

localTargetPath.description: Local target path on the device.

fileName.description: ThingSpace-generated name of the file. You will use this name when listing or scheduling campaigns for the file.
